price: Rabbiin samiifi dachii dhugaan uume. sana keessa mu’uminootaaf mallattootu jira.
arabic: خَلَقَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ بِٱلۡحَقِّۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَةٗ لِّلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: khalaqa al-lahu al-samāwāti wal-arḍa bil-ḥaqi inna fī dhālika laāyatan lil'mu'minīna
